law.catch_line: Duties and responsibilities of owners or occupants of land.

text.section:
Sec. 14-3. Duties and responsibilities of owners or occupants of land.
The owners of land, proprietors, lessees, tenants, or other occupants of land within the unincorporated area of the County shall be responsible for the existence of fires thereon, and it shall be the duty of such parties, and they hereby are required by this section, to prevent the starting of fires on such lands, and said owners or other occupants shall eliminate and extinguish and assist in eliminating and extinguishing the same when burning or which may exist from any cause whether of their own account or from other source, including the spreading of fires to said lands from outside areas.
